statements: SELECT * FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress;
SELECT patient_id, success_rate FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT patient_id, procedure_date FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, procedure_date, success_rate FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress WHERE success_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY procedure_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, AVG(success_rate) AS avg_success_rate FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(success_rate) > 80
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress WHERE success_rate < 70 ORDER BY patient_id, procedure_date
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_procedures FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY total_procedures DESC
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_transplantation_progress WHERE procedure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM StemCellTransplantationDetails;
SELECT donor_id, recipient_id, transplantation_date FROM StemCellTransplantationDetails ORDER BY transplantation_date DESC;
SELECT recipient_id, donor_id, success_rate FROM StemCellTransplantationDetails WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT recipient_id, donor_id, transplantation_date, success_rate FROM StemCellTransplantationDetails WHERE recipient_id = 1001;
SELECT donor_id, transplantation_date, success_rate FROM StemCellTransplantationDetails WHERE success_rate < 0.5;
SELECT donor_id, recipient_id, transplantation_date, success_rate FROM StemCellTransplantationDetails WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY transplantation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM StemCellTransplantationDetails WHERE donor_id = 100 AND recipient_id = 200;
SELECT patient_id, transplantation_id, outcome FROM TransplantationOutcomes WHERE outcome = 'successful' ORDER BY transplantation_id;
SELECT t.*, o.outcome FROM StemCellTransplantationDetails t INNER JOIN TransplantationOutcomes o ON t.donor_id = o.transplantation_id;
SELECT donor_id, recipient_id, transplantation_date, success_rate FROM StemCellTransplantationDetails WHERE success_rate BETWEEN 0.6 AND 0.8;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_procedures;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_data;
SELECT procedure_id, patient_id, success_rate FROM stem_cell_procedures WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT transplant_id, transplantation_date, patient_id FROM transplantation_history ORDER BY transplantation_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT procedure_id, patient_id, procedure_date, success_rate FROM stem_cell_procedures WHERE success_rate >= 0.9 ORDER BY procedure_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_blood_type FROM patient_data WHERE patient_blood_type='AB' ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT procedure_id, patient_id FROM transplantation_history ORDER BY transplant_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM stem_cell_procedures JOIN transplantation_history ON stem_cell_procedures.procedure_id = transplantation_history.procedure_id JOIN patient_data ON transplantation_history.patient_id = patient_data.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM StemCellTransplantation;
SELECT first_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT last_name, blood_type FROM Donors ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT id, transplantation_date FROM StemCellTransplantation WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT first_name, last_name, transplantation_id, outcome FROM Patients JOIN TransplantationOutcome ON Patients.id = TransplantationOutcome.transplantation_id;
SELECT * FROM StemCellTransplantation JOIN Patients ON StemCellTransplantation.patient_id = Patients.id WHERE success = true;

SELECT Patients.first_name, Patients.last_name, Donors.first_name, Donors.last_name FROM StemCellTransplantation JOIN Patients ON StemCellTransplantation.patient_id = Patients.id JOIN Donors ON StemCellTransplantation.donor_id = Donors.id;
SELECT * FROM StemCellTransplantation WHERE transplantation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT Patients.first_name, Patients.last_name, Donors.blood_type, TransplantationOutcome.outcome FROM StemCellTransplantation JOIN Patients ON StemCellTransplantation.patient_id = Patients.id JOIN Donors ON StemCellTransplantation.donor_id = Donors.id JOIN TransplantationOutcome ON StemCellTransplantation.id = TransplantationOutcome.transplantation_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transplants, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Patients JOIN StemCellTransplantation ON Patients.id = StemCellTransplantation.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM stem_cell_patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT donor_name, donor_blood_type FROM stem_cell_donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT center_name, location, director_name FROM transplantation_centers WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT patient_name, transplantation_date, success_rate FROM stem_cell_patients JOIN transplantations ON stem_cell_patients.patient_id = transplantations.patient_id WHERE success = true;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM stem_cell_patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT donor_name, donor_blood_type FROM stem_cell_donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, transplantation_date, success_rate FROM stem_cell_patients JOIN transplantations ON stem_cell_patients.patient_id = transplantations.patient_id;
SELECT center_name, director_name FROM transplantation_centers WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
